message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this valuable product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. I could consider letting it go for $11,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I am still unable to meet you at a price higher than $10,000. Could we possibly find a middle ground?
